name: YaleView
0:
”Alexa, show my front room camera”
”Alexa, show my living room camera”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Yale View skill now you can control your Yale Wi-Fi cameras using Alexa with your Echo Show and Echo Spot.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your Yale View app account and discover your cameras.

After linking your Yale View app account and discovering your Yale cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming live video to your Echo Show and Echo Spot. To see the live stream from your Yale camera on the device, just say commands like:


- "Alexa, show my front door camera"
- "Alexa, show my living room camera"

Compatible Yale Cameras (only Yale Wi-Fi cameras are compatible with this skill. CCTV systems are not supported) :
- Yale Outdoor Wi-Fi Camera (SV-DB4MX-B)
- Yale Indoor Wi-Fi Camera (SV-DFFI-W; SV-DF7I-W)
- Yale All-in-One Outdoor Camera (SV-DAFX-W)


Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
